text: Norwegian Wood is a 2010 Japanese romantic drama movie directed by Tran Anh Hung and was based on the novel of the same name by Haruki Murakami. It stars Ken'ichi Matsuyama, Rinko Kikuchi, Kiko Mizuhara, Tetsuji Tamayama, Kengo Kora, Eriko Hatsune and was distributed by Toho. ==Other websites== * * Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:Japanese romance movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Tran Anh Hung Category:Movies set in Tokyo Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Norwegian Wood (movie)
